metadata.title: Agora Convo AI
metadata.description: Chat with a sample AI voice agent and select different voices in a live demo of Agora's Conversational AI Engine.

custom_agent.title: Custom Agent
custom_agent.description: Please contact Agora staff to get a custom agent ID
custom_agent.message_error: Failed to retrieve agent. No such agent in the database.
custom_agent.message_sunset: Agent has been taken offline. Please contact Agora staff.

enable_aivad.title: Intelligent Interruption Handling
enable_aivad.description: This feature makes AI better understand you and reduces false interruption.

enable_sal.title: Voiceprint Lock
enable_sal.off_description: Without this, the agent might be interrupted or distracted by other voices nearby.
enable_sal.autoLearning_description: AI automatically learns your voiceprint from your conversations with the agent and will ignore other people's voices.
enable_sal.manual_description: Record a short voiceprint, and the agent will focus only on your voice.
enable_sal.record_title: Please read this clearly and aloud.
enable_sal.hint: You can only save one voiceprint. Recording a new one will replace the current one.
enable_sal.recording_warning: Click to stop recording and upload, minimum 10s, maximum 20s
enable_sal.recording_warning_min: That's a bit too short. Please record for at least 10 seconds.
enable_sal.no_record_dialog_description: You'll need a voiceprint to use Personalized Mode. The app will switch back to [Previous Mode] when you exit.
enable_sal.record_dialog_description: Your voice is stored locally by default. Agora's voiceprint locking feature needs to collect your voice. After completing a single experience of this feature, the voiceprint will be deleted from the cloud, and your voice will never be used for commercial purposes. Please refer to the <link>Privacy Policy</link> for details.

dialog.title: AI Avatar Will Be Reset
dialog.description: Reconfigure AI avatar after changing preset/language.

word.title: Word Mode
word.description: Word-by-word rendering, subtitles synchronized with speech

chunk.title: Text - Sync Mode
chunk.description: Text mode with subtitles and speech displayed synchronously

greeting.greeting2: Welcome to use Agora Convo AI Engine
greeting.greeting3: Have you ever questioned the nature of your reality?
greeting.speakLoudly: I'm ready to listen. Please speak clearly to start.
greeting.failed: Failed to join. Please try again.

privacyDialog.title: Personal Data Protection Guide
privacyDialog.description: Welcome to the Agora Conversational AI Engine! By tapping "Agree," you confirm you’ve read and accepted our <link>Terms of Services</link> and <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>. If you don't agree, some features of the app will be unavailable. This avatar is AI-generated.

agent.subtitle: Subtitles
agent.agentAborted: Agent left abnormally. Please try again.
agent.agentReconnectedTimeout: Network error. Please check your network settings.
agent.tmpDisconnected: Network error. Please check your network settings.
agent.errorTitle: Failed to join. Please try again.

reminder.firstSpeaking: At the beginning of the conversation, please speak loudly and clearly to help the AI agent better lock onto your voice.

agent.interruptAgentTip: Speak or click button to interrupt agent

compatibility.errorDescription: Please check if your browser supports WebRTC and whether the microphone permission is enabled
compatibility.errorHelper: We recommend using the latest version of your browser on the latest operating system

devMode.title: Dev Mode
devMode.description: In dev mode, you can debug the Agent

userInfo.bio-placeholder: Please enter your bio, let AI agent know you better ❤️

deleteAccount.title: Important Notice
deleteAccount.description: Once deleted, your account and all its data will be permanently erased and cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
deleteAccount.checkbox: I understand the risks of deleting my account
deleteAccount.uncheckWarning: To continue, you must check the box to confirm you understand the risks.

log.label: Quick Report
log.uploadErrorTip: Opps! Something went wrong. Please try reporting again.
log.uploadSuccessTip: We've received your report. Thanks for helping us improve!

login.title: Log in or Sign up
login.buttonTip2: Log in to chat for free
login.privacyPolicy: I accept the <link>Terms of Service</link> and <policyLink>Privacy Policy</policyLink>
login.termsTip: Please accept the terms to proceed.
login.unauthorizedError: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

conversationTimer.title: Time's Up!
conversationTimer.description: Each conversation is limited to {minutes} minutes. The time is up for this conversation. You can close this dialog to start a new conversation.

agent-action.max-image-size: Image size must be less than 5MB
agent-action.upload-image-failed: Failed to upload image. Please try again.
agent-action.missing-image-url: Image URL is not available for resending. Please upload a new image.
agent-action.resend-image-error: Failed to resend image. Please try again.
agent-action.max-image-dimensions: Image dimensions must not exceed 2048x2048 pixels.
agent-action.upload-image-tooltip: Image size up to 5MB, dimensions under 2048x2048. Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP, JPEG formats.
agent-action.avatar-busy-error: All avatars are busy now. Please try again later.

preset.sip_call_out_description: Enter your phone number/fixed phone number and dial out, the AI smart customer service will call your phone and communicate with you

sip.invalid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number
sip.inbound_hint: To ensure the normal operation of the call service and dispute tracing, your call records (including phone number, call time, and call duration) will be recorded.

status.calling: Calling... Please answer the phone on your end

dialog.title: To ensure the normal operation of the call service and dispute tracing, your call records (including phone number, call time, and call duration) will be recorded

sip.timer: Smart Customer Service Phone Communication Single Experience Limit 10 Minutes
sip.startSipError: Failed to start phone call. Please try again later.

preset.title: Smart Assistant
preset.description: Universal AI assistant that you can chat with about anything you want to know
